channel.title: Someone fucken help ffs been waiting for 2h!
channel.description:
IK THIS IS WRONG SECTION BUT NO1 IS IN THE HELP SECTION AND I NEED HELP ASAP
THIS IS (PI)
I WANT TO ADD DROPS TO THE TARN AND HERE IS THE DROPS I TRY TO ADD BUT IT DOSENT ADD
#tern 1591:35 1357:1 1371:1 1317:1 1201:1 1163:1 565:20 560:45 886:150 2363:1 995:2500 892:42 1149:1 4087:1 4585:1 11286:1
CAN ANYONE TELL ME WHY?

item.title: Someone fucken help ffs been waiting for 2h!
item.dc:creator: @leboaymen leboaymen
item.description:
@leboaymen wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:5, topic:408523”][quote author=kid2kewl2bereal link=topic=509805.msg3699137#msg3699137 date=1312632812]
Are you in the Bin folder or the Data folder? 'cause, idk why, but for some reason my source (PI) had 2 Shops.cfg files. One in Data and one in Bin, the correct one, i believe, was the one in bin.
[/quote]

nope it added that in before but still all it drops is charms before i added the code it it used to drop nothing only charms
He is talking about DROPS not SHOPS.

Try something like this, and put it in npcdrops.tsm

#tern 1591:35 1357:1 1371:1 1317:1 1201:1 1163:1 565:20 560:45 886:150 2363:1 995:2500 892:42 1149:1 4087:1 4585:1 11286:1 [/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Someone fucken help ffs been waiting for 2h!
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

kid2kewl2bereal:

Are you in the Bin folder or the Data folder? 'cause, idk why, but for some reason my source (PI) had 2 Shops.cfg files. One in Data and one in Bin, the correct one, i believe, was the one in bin.

He is talking about DROPS not SHOPS.

Try something like this, and put it in npcdrops.tsm

#tern 1591:35 1357:1 1371:1 1317:1 1201:1 1163:1 565:20 560:45 886:150 2363:1 995:2500 892:42 1149:1 4087:1 4585:1 11286:1
